headline: Waste Management Expands AI Recycling Network With Pembroke Pines Megaplant
summary: Waste Management has opened a large, AI powered recycling facility in Pembroke Pines, South Florida. The plant is designed to increase recycling capacity and efficiency while serving multiple counties in the region. This new facility represents a meaningful expansion of the company’s recycling infrastructure and support for local environmental initiatives. For investors watching NYSE:WM, this new facility arrives with the stock trading at $229.58 and long term returns that have been...
